author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: و جان مردمانرا بزرگترین مایهٴ آسایش و پرورش است خوشا روز آنکه بیاری خداوند یکتا از آلایش گیتی و آنچه در او است رهائی یافت و در سایهٴ درخت دانائی بیاسود آوای هزاردستان که بر شاخسار
translation: This robe with which the body and soul of man hath been adorned is the very foundation of his well-being and development. Oh, how blessed the day when, aided by the grace and might of the one true God, man will have freed himself from the bondage and corruption of the world and all that is therein, and will have attained unto true and abiding rest beneath the shadow of the Tree of Knowledge!
